review_text: It was a very pleasant stay as it was convenient for us to go and enjoy my reunion at Bucknell.

The home was super clean and comfortable. Angelo was very friendly and very quick to respond to messages. Everything was labeled so that you could find what you needed easily. On top of all that, my husband accidentally left his shoes behind and Angelo offered to mail them to us. Wonderful home and wonderful host. Would recommend to anyone! Thanks Angelo!
Clean and well appointed. Safe neighborhood. Beautiful view of the river. Not much to do in the area but we came for a college graduation and so it worked out well. Thanks!
Great location. Safe, convenient and perfect for kids (nice playground next door). Cute house, would choose to stay again!
Just what we needed when we needed it. It was for business and working 15 minutes of the job and the Sunbury social club fixed food to go
Great place to stay near Bucknell. The river was beautiful. Very quiet neighborhood.

Angelo’s place was exactly as described. What you don’t get from the pics is that it emanates a peaceful vibe. We rented the place to have a central locations to visit with family. Angelo’s home allowed us to meet our expectation. It’s neat, organized, spacious and clean.
Had a great stay. Will certainly stay here again when visiting family! Nice quiet location and perfect accommodations.
Was a great place. It was perfect. Angelo was so accommodating. Stay here you won’t regret it.

The island house was very comfortable and close to the river for a nice , scenic walk. Comfortable beds and fun artwork on the walls. My daughter loved the old-fashioned telephone and huge TV in the master bedroom. It had everything we needed for our short stay and was clean and welcoming.
Angelo’s island house is the perfect place to stay when visiting Sunbury. Next time we visit family there, we will definitely be choosing this place again.

Great place to stay! We get what we needed, a very cozy, calm, confortable and clean housing to rest, perfect to get away from big cities. Angelo gives you very clear instructions, he cares about your stay. Highly recommended!
The house is very pretty I love the scenery and the river everything was great, I will stay in the home again ❤️

Angelo and his family were amazing. They went above and beyond helping us when we couldn't get the heat to work. His sweet father came over to try to help and then his adorable wife drove an hour and a half and got it working! They both were very sweet and hung out and talked with us. Felt like good friends by the time they left.
Really cool location located right next to the Susquehanna River. Had a little restaurant on the river and a park. Definitely would stay again! Everything was clean and adorably decorated. We absolutely loved our girls get away at this Airbnb!
Everything was spot on about the house and description. Very flexible with timing. Will be back

Exceeded our expectations. Close to casual restaurants and a brew pub. Wifi access, comfortable furniture, good beds a nice kitchen a and bath. Clear check-in instructions and easy to find. Thank you for making everything easy and convenient!
We enjoyed our stay. The location was great, very peaceful. We loved the river theme in the house. The house was very clean and comfortable. Take time to walk along the river park in Sunbury.

This was our 2nd stay at the Island House and the 2nd time we’ve wished we booked for longer! The house and space is perfect. So peaceful and comfortable. You can see the beautiful Susquehanna River and walk right to it. Close to lots of local attractions -Knoebels is a must! Great priced and sized amusement park. We have 3 generations on our trips to sunbury and all of us have a wonderful time! Angelo is so responsive and great, he is truly a SUPER host!!

We really enjoyed our stay. Packers Island is an ideal place to stay in the Susquehanna Valley. We were able to quickly get to great hiking locations, restaurants, and the local colleges. The house was perfect for the four of us and we particularly enjoyed the peaceful serenity of the Island.

Angelo’s house was perfect! It was decorated with the river theme and was so clean & comfortable. Such an easy walk to enjoy the river and quiet surroundings. Comfortable bed and provided everything you needed down to night lights! Also the home was very clean. Mid century design but everything worked well and was in very nice shape. He communicated quickly and was such a nice man. Would definitely recommend this home to anyone!
Angelo is a great host. Very responsive and flexible with us checking in. His house is very clean and nice and suited us perfectly.
Angelo’s house was immaculate! Perfect in every way. He was very responsive and the whole experience was a pleasure! We will definitely go back!
Great place!! Clean and beautiful surroundings! We took a great walk around the neighborhood too!

Angelo’s place was perfect for our family of four after a day at Knoebles, and Angelo was super helpful and responsive. Everything was very clean and well stocked with an excellent layout. We just wanted to relax after a long day and this house was so nice and peaceful-the yard is pristine with a great river location. The little playground was fun in the morning for our kids. The TV in the main bedroom is HUGE! We’ll definitely be back next time we go to Knoebles.
great place and location! loved the decorations and not to far from Knoebels!
We were in town for a family funeral. This place gave us a space for family to come together. Perfectly met our needs.
The island house was clean, comfortable, and conveniently located.
Very nice accommodations in a nice peaceful community. Will highly recommend.
Thanks for the stay! Was the perfect place, felt right at home!

We had a great stay at Angelo's place. The house is in a quiet neighborhood near the lake and convenient to local restaurants. We dropped my son off at Bucknell University, which was 15 minutes away, so the location was perfect. We will be back!
Angelo is a great host and the home is the perfect size for 3-6 people. The home was super clean and had all the basics necessary for a few days stay!
Great clean house. very quiet. Owner was friendly and responsive. Will definitely return.

Angelo’s place was perfect for visiting family in Sunbury and attending a nearby family event. We enjoyed walking to the Social Club for dinner on Friday and breakfast on Sunday and taking a walk around the neighborhood. The place was just the right size for us and very clean and nicely decorated with a river/fishing theme. The beds were comfortable and there was plenty of towels. Our time there was relaxing and peaceful. One small suggestion would be to have a dish rack for doing dishes. Thank you!
It was a lovely place. Don't hesitate to book. It is exactly as Angelo described and the positive reviews listed. Highly recommend the local Mexican restaurant.
We were very pleased with our stay. We did know that there was not a washer or dryer but that would of been a great option.
Had such a great stay. Place was so easy to find. really clean. felt right at home. LOVED that things were labeled - no guessing when it came to light switches or where to fond extra towels.
Nice 1 floor house in a quiet neighborhood. Worked great for us & our family. Very clean all over.
Awesome host! Very kind. Place was wonderful- right next to the river. Our only regret was that we were in a hurry and didn’t bring our boats. Awesome place- hope to get back here again.

Angelo's place was great! Very spacious for 4 people... very safe & nice neighborhood! After a long day of activities, we enjoyed grabbing dinner at a local pizza shop across the river bridge and just hanging out watching a movie and getting comfy on the sectional in front of the TV! The big screen tv in front of the king size bed was awesome!!! We enjoyed taking a walk down to the social club Restaurant to spend some time at the park and taking a stroll along the river!!!
Well maintained and easy to find. Host is exceptional and responds well to any questions. Quiet place on a beautiful day. River was peaceful…

Angelo was responsive to questions. He labeled light switches so we weren’t guessing and had a list of where kitchen items were located. The guest book was a nice touch to see what others enjoyed. The house was clean and comfortable. The river is within walking distance with a small park area.
Great place to get away

We stayed here after a day with the kids at Knoebels. We were tired and the 25 minute drive from the park was great. Check in was a breeze and the house was easy to find. We picked up pizza at Giugi’s (delicious!), watched a movie, and really enjoyed our quiet evening after a busy day at the amusement park. The house was super clean, cozy, and the perfect size for a family of 5. It’s very private and we walked down to the river in the morning. There is a small playground there and the kids played. Thank you!
We loved our stay. The house was exactly as pictured, super cute and met our needs for graduation weekend at Bucknell University. We would stay again!
I would go back

I enjoyed my stay. The guest book was helpful in knowing some good places to eat and fun things to do.
Only 1 thing, I wish there had been some coffee available in the house.

We stayed at Angelo’s place while visiting family! It was exactly what we were hoping for! Very clean and great location! Angelo helped with any questions we had! We enjoyed our stay and will definitely be back!

Great home in a very ideal location!
We came to central PA to visit family and were pleasantly surprised to find this rental home. Its location on the “island” was very ideal for us as it is close to many of the small towns. In addition, the home itself was very well-appointed with everything one would need to make a stay enjoyable. The decor was the best part though. Local pictures and works of art and antique replicas were displayed throughout the home which really added to the ambiance.
We look forward to staying here again!!
Everything was just right - responsive host, smooth check-in, spotlessly clean accommodations, warm and cozy. No notes!

Our stay at Angelo’s was wonderful after a day at Knobels. He was very accommodating and the house was exactly as advertised, equipped with everything we needed. We enjoyed the surrounding area and the town of Sunbury as well!
We had a wonderful time in this lovely home. The location was perfect. The home layout, kitchen and bathroom amenities were everything we needed. Would highly recommend.

Great location (nice view of the river). Very clean. All the right amenities. And a very communicative host.
Stayed here to attend a Bucknell Football Game and it was very convenient (14 min. drive) to campus.
Great place! Has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Beautiful and quiet location. Angelo was very responsive with any questions. Would certainly stay again if we are in the area again.

This home is adorable, comfortable, clean and close to everything! We visit friends in the area - had 4 adults (including a disabled senior) and 2 kids (5, 10) and it was perfect for all. We did knoebels - always a great time and it was about 20-25 min away. River is 2 houses away, great neighborhood to walk, playground for the kids. We will definitely look to stay here again.
Beautiful home Had a great stay

We had a great stay in this tidy place on the river. We were visiting for Bucknell Parents weekend. It's an easy 10-15 minute drive to campus. Brought the college kid back for BBQ at Skeeters. Beds are comfortable and the labels (on light switches, cabinets, etc.) were appreciated. Loved walking around the island for our morning walk.
Great place for a getaway. Great layout for a movie viewing or something similar

Location was great, right by the river. house was extremely clean and cool and comfortable, it looked like a model home. I plan on spending more time back in Sunbury and I will definitely book this B&B again.

Island House is a beautiful peaceful place to enjoy the Susquehanna River and the town of Sunbury. Very clean, comfortable and welcoming! The art work and the art pieces give it a perfect look! Definitely would stay again if we find ourselves in this area!

This is a really nice little house, in a very picturesque setting. It is literally less than 3 minutes to the Susquehanna River! It was exceptionally clean and the linens were great! There were lots of nice towels and the bed sheets were wonderful. The beds were super comfortable and that, along with the quiet neighborhood, helped us get a great night’s sleep!
Angelo might be the very best AirBnB host I have ever dealt with in terms of communication. He was so good about quickly answering questions. He obviously cares about the folks he hosts. Thank you!
We highly recommend this home. The place is very comfortable, has a beautiful view, and is well-equipped. In addition, it is very clean and welcoming.
great well stocked , everything you need to enjoy your time whether your in and out or relaxing.
Great location. We especially loved the backyard and the comfortable beds. Lovely home!

Angelos place is even better than the pictures . It is a special little spot , you can sit and watch the river from both the front and the back ! The house decor is lovely, beds were very comfy . Angelo was great to work with , I will definitely be back !
very nice place

Angelo’s place is exceptional! Very clean and an excellent location for us. We were visiting for a week to see family in the area and our accommodations were amazing! Very well decorated and towels and bedding were super soft and comfortable. It was the perfect place for our family of 4. We will definitely stay here again when I’m the area.
Grey location and awesome place! Highly recommend
Awesome place! Wonderful neighborhood
so clean and great location. comfortable beds and living areas
Great house! Clean, comfortable and felt safe in the neighborhood!
nice place, will recommend to my friend
Nice and quiet island. We enjoyed our stay.
A wonderful place to disconnect from everyday life, a very quiet neighborhood, everything was very clean, an incredible experience.
Beautiful tiny house. Place is clean and beautifully decorated. Kirk is the great host

The view is Beautiful! Kirk has done an amazing job with the outside space, giving guests so many different spots to enjoy the beautiful river view! Having kayaks at the house was also nice to be able to get out on the river and explore. We had a wonderful time and would definitely stay here again.

We really enjoyed our stay here. Very relaxing to sit on the dock under the enclosure. The swing is nice too!
It may be a "Tiny Home" but these hosts really created an outdoor paradise in beautiful surroundings!
Our only regret is that we didnt have more time to spend here!
Great place, hopefully we'll be able to make it back for a longer stay!
Beautiful for gate away weekend. Everything is as described. Highly recommended.
Everything was beautiful, we are planning to go back soon!

Kirk & Danielle’s Tiny Home exceeded our expectations. Not only was the home clean, the property itself is gorgeous. Having direct access to the Susquehanna River was ideal, plus the multiple outdoor areas (decks, docks, swing, etc) I really enjoyed drinking my coffee every morning on the dock with the screened in porch.
Would absolutely recommend!

We stayed here for an autumn getaway and although it rained for half our trip, we still had a great time. The tiny house is cozy and has thoughtful amenities inside and out. Plenty of shops, wineries and breweries within a 20-minute drive and state parks nearby for fishing and hiking.
Kirk was responsive and unobtrusive during our trip and the place was spotless. You can’t top the river views - we were able to watch the sunrise from the bed. We hope to visit again soon!

This was my second stay at the tiny house on the river and I just love it! Perfect hosts, perfect communication, perfectly clean & comfy little place with its own boat ramp. The only thing they could make this little place better would be if it was all mine!
lovely little place, would stay again!

This sweet and immaculate "tiny house" is all about its location on a stunning and pristine stretch of the Susquehanna River. There are six different ways of engaging with the river: a panoramic view from the bedroom, a comfortable patio just outside the kitchen, a small deck and cafe table directly overlooking the river from above, a porch swing on the perfect lawn a few feet back from the water, a stable dock with two lounge chairs, and a gravel boat launch hidden from direct view. With sunrise and moonrise happening across the water behind a small mountain ridge, and herons and ducks flying around, you couldn't ask for a more beautiful location. The house is simple and comfortably furnished, and feels very connected to the site. Very easy on/off the main road.
Another great stay at this beautiful spot!
Such a cute little place on the river - we loved our stay!
Great location with beautiful river views

I wanted to have some time away with peaceful scenery and that is exactly what this lovely tiny house is! I wish I had stayed longer, but I will know next time. The host was wonderful with instructions and it was just what I needed. ☺️❤️

This was my first time at an Airbnb and Kirk definitely raised my initial expectations. Everything was organized, neat, and clean. The description matched the place and he provided the home with basically everything!

Flawless experience! Kirk’s friendly & helpful communication was much appreciated, and the space was exactly as described, if not better. Spotless, comfortable & cute, in an ideal location.
The tiny home on the river is so perfect for me that I booked another stay before I even left!

Beautiful view. Peaceful and quiet. Great location. Awesome host, very detailed instructions and good recommendations. Just an absolute gorgeous property on the water. Well worth every penny. Thank you for a much needed relaxing weekend.

Kirk's place was even more charming than we expected. Everything was spotlessly clean. Kirk gave us a heads up about how tiny the place was, but it was everything my husband and I needed. There is plenty of outdoor space - a table with umbrella, outdoor couch and chairs on the patio, and a beautiful deck with table and two chairs by the river. My husband took one of the provided kayaks out for a paddle on the river. Kirk recommended a restaurant in Lewisburg (Gram's), where we had an amazing breakfast. Every time I contacted him, he as quick to respond.

This tiny home was the perfect getaway!
The owners did a fantastic job on designing this house and they had stocked it with everything you would need. The surrounding towns were beautiful to walk and explore and the local food was so good. Waking up on the river every morning was perfect and we really enjoyed staying in this cool tiny home!

My husband and I had a great time at Kirk’s place. This was our 3rd time here and we always love how peaceful and beautiful it is there. We loved the addition of the fishing pier!! We can’t wait until next time we can get away for a few days here!!
Perfect for kayaking.

Kirk and Danielle’s place was by far one of the best Airbnb experiences my partner and I had. From the cleanliness of the place, to the well stocked kitchen, to the beautiful river views and the peaceful atmosphere, we really enjoyed our time here! Our favorite thing to do was sit by the dock and fish (we caught so many catfish!) whilst taking in the sun and view. The house also had a cute swing seat outside for when we didn’t want to be on the deck.
The only con is to make sure you put a lotttt of bug spray on!! My partner and I got a lot of mosquito bites but it was still worth it haha. Nevertheless, we are definitely thinking about coming back again!

My husband and I only went for one night as we were on our way to New York. If I could give it more stars I would. Excellent place very clean, tidy and very quiet. It was exactly what we were looking for and more than expected. Thanks Kirt for the space and I hope to come back one day. Highly recommended.

The host was very responsive and helpful recommending places to go. The tiny house was cozy, spotless and modern with thoughtful decor. Perfect if you enjoy the river and relaxing outdoors. Absolutely loved it. Look forward to another visit!

We had a second excellent stay and even went into town to the Brasserie Louis for our honeymoon (we just got married 😊) and wanted to come back to this serene spot. Lovely stay again all around! We will be back!
Had a great stay at Kirk’s tiny house. Loved the view and sitting outside in the morning watching all the boats on the river. Kayaks were fun. Would recommend and would stay here again!
Pictures don’t do this property justice. Can’t wait to come back. The hiking, hosts recommendations and the fishing off the kayaks was top notch. Would give 6 stars if I could.
Clean place with a very beautiful view
It was such a great place to unwind and relax! Very clean, beautiful views, great outdoor space from the dock, hanging by the fire pit and bbqing!

My husband and I stayed in this little gem for a 3-day getaway. It was our first experience in a Tiny House and certainly won't be our last! The photos don't do the place justice- a lovely stay both inside (modern amenities, tidy, and functional) and outside (beautiful view, seating areas, fire pits, etc). We brought our two-person canoe and were able to be out in the water in minutes from the boat launch.
Kirk went above and beyond to make sure we were taken care of. Highly recommend!!

We really enjoyed our visit! The tiny home was exactly as pictured and the property was even more beautiful in person. We loved spending time on the lake and using the kayaks provided. It was the perfect peaceful summer getaway. Thank you Kirk!
Perfect for a couples get away !
This was our second visit, will go back again. The new deck overlooking the water is beautiful.

This tiny home was just as described. I loved it - compact, clean, neat, right at the river with a dock, kayaks and 2 fire pits. The beautiful weather was a bonus! Host was always responsive and accommodating.

The tiny house was exactly what my partner and I needed for a mini vacation. It was very clean and had great places to sit and relax outside. We loved having a dock to drink our coffee on and took the kayaks out everyday. It is small, but worked really well for us. It is off of a busy road, but you can’t beat being right on the river and it was very peaceful at night!

I had a lovely overnight stay at Kirk's tiny home. I was travelling from New York to Ohio on business and picked Kirk's place to break my journey mainly because of the availability of the kayaks. There could have been no better way to start my day than to take a dawn paddle up river and round the island, before embarking on my long drive to Cleveland. The kayak was in great shape and the setting is beautiful. The home itself is exactly as described – and perfect for one person or a couple. Some reviews have mentioned the bed being a bit small but I'm 6' and had a very comfortable night. The only downside for me was that there was a bit of noise from the highway but the riverside location more than made up for that.
Wonderful stay, absolutely beautiful and so relaxing. Wish we would have stayed longer. Lots of restaurants and cute downtown area, anything you really need within about 15 mins. Very cozy and clean.
Loved my stay here. Very beautiful and relaxing.
We will be returning!

Our experience at Kirk & Danielle’s Airbnb was absolutely wonderful. They were so nice, responsive and helpful. As for the Tiny House, It exceeded all our expectations. When we arrived we were at awe over the beauty and maintenance of this property.
Pictures don’t do it Justice. We had everything plus more; a comfortable bed, great amenities and super clean and beautiful surroundings outside as well. The private dock and the kayaks was my favorite! Morning coffee on the mini balcony while listening to the birds is a must.
Great location! Perfect for couples on a weekend getaway. We loved being right on the water and having access to the kayaks, grill, and fire pits

Perfect spot for relaxing trip. Place is tiny, but you want to spend most your time outside. Kayak in great shape, easy get in and out of river. Firepit was great and wood kept dry. Only thing is you can hear the traffic from rt 11, which I didn't mind. Definitely saving for future trips.

Very small, but very much worth the price!
The was by itself in the corner of the property.
Very beautiful view to wake up to and the kayaking was a plus! Despite it being so far away from things to do it’s very nice and cozy for 2 people

The little house was perfect for our getaway weekend.
So peaceful and beautiful scenery. Loved the fact that is super close to Lewisburg and have have some favorite breweries to visit there and other restaurants.
Awesome waking up with the best view of the water :)
Kirk & Danielle were super friendly and gave us good suggestions for local places etc etc. Love the patio area and fire pit. Next time we book with them I have to bring my telescope because you can see every star in the sky. Too much light pollution where we live unfortunately. Lol Can’t wait to go back :)
I enjoyed my stay! I enjoyed sitting out looking at the water. It was a great tiny house experience!

Our stay at the riverfront was exactly what we needed. From kayaking at sunrise, to walking the nearby town of Lewisburg, and all the attractions that Kirk and Danielle recommended. This truly was a trip that we will remember. The tiny house was an awsome experience, highly recommend!!!
The “tiny” house is quite a gem. My wife and I absolutely loved everything it had to offer. Kirk took care of everything so all we had to do was enjoy it.

The place was great and matched our expectations.
Kirk was responsive and we had a great time.
On a totally unrelated note, the river was extremely dirty and there was visible raw sewage in the river (and a lot of it).
Great little house, perfect for two. Convenient location, 5 minutes from the Bucknell campus.

Our stay was just amazing! My husband and I took advantage of all that this home had to offer by kayaking along the river and building fires while looking at the stars. Check-in was easy and our hosts were quick to respond when needed! A perfect get away for some much needed rest and solitude.

I wanted a small house to spend time with my husband and I for two people. I found a house that was so perfect in front of the river. Tiny House is very clean and the location is very good. You can see that owner take care of inside and outside the house. It is a place where you can relax just by looking at the river. When I contacted the owner, he was immediately contacted, so it was convenient. While using Airbnb, there are some houses that have only good pictures, but this one is really recommended.

My stay here was perfect for the UnPaved cycling race weekend in Lewisburg in October. Kirk was highly responsive and accommodating. The place was very clean and well prepared.
The bed was comfortable and potentially a little short depending on your needs. I’m 6ft2 and had to sleep diagonally in the bed to ensure my feet didn’t hit the end of the bed. So if you’re planning to share the bed, consider the height as a factor here. Would recommend this place and will consider staying here again next year for the UnPaved race. Thanks Kirk!
Very cozy and convenient to Lewisburg, we had fun fishing from the dock, fire pit and grill were great too.
Kirk and Danielle's tiny house is a perfect weekend getaway on the water. Fire pit, outdoor seating with a patio make this tiny house a cozy stay. We will be back!

The tiny home was serenely located on the river in a quiet strip of houses and tucked away easily accessible off of the highway. Thoughtful instructions/local guide provided by Kirk, mirrored the same thoughtfulness found throughout the tiny home itself. Well stocked efficient kitchen for cooking etc. everything you’d need for a delightful nighttime fire experience, or to cozy up on the dock with some coffee in the morning.
To add the cherry on top, it was easy to check in and our host communicated seamlessly. Would absolutely recommend, and will stay again if we happen to find ourselves in the area in the future.
Enjoyed the fire pit and relaxing chairs by the river!
We truly enjoyed ourselves and will most definitely be booking again

We loved the place and its locale on the river. We wished we could have stayed another day to spend on the river. Our host was extremely friendly and accommodating. The tiny home was VERY well designed, placed, and furnished. We loved the light and view from the abundant windows, which were well-covered by shades at night.
Beautiful spot right on the river! Perfect for two for a getaway. Kayaking on the river is lovely.
Easy to get to clean and very easy communication nice place don’t forget your fishing pole lol
Loved the space. It was perfect for what we needed. If you’re into kayaking the views and just stunning. We definitely want to come back again :)
The place is better than the pictures. Very clean and cozy and the view is amazing.
Listing is truly accurate. Location is right off main highway and minutes to nearby Towns. We enjoyed our stay and will return.

Quaint, well planned trailer home with direct lake access. Needed getaway just for ourselves, and this was economical option. Host Kirk & family in house directly across lawn. Very friendly when briefly met while we took out canoes and he was preparing pontoon. Emailed instructions worked perfectly and recommended Gram's eatery for brunch was terrific. Lots of wood under water side of house for outside fire pit. Propane barbecue lights up right away and tools for BBQ hanging from side (right under cover). Pretty quiet/private area.

Beautiful and peaceful place. We did not have to leave the house, it had everything we needed. The kayaking was so much fun, water is very clean. Also in a great area, the entire stay we didn’t even see anyone, very quiet.
A truly special place for a quick get away !.

The tiny home was 5 stars all the way! The inside of the home was very clean and well equipped. The outside area features a beautiful view of the river with several seating areas. Communication with the owner before and after our stay was prompt and efficient. There were no questions or concerns during our visit. We were happy with this Airbnb and would recommend it to anyone visiting the area!

Excellent stay for a long weekend on the water, perfect! Hubby and I wanted waterfront, kayaking, swimming, relaxing and the lil house was perfect! Everything Kirk describes about the property is 100% accurate, but the views are even more beautiful in person! Everything you need is in this house. Extremely clean, and very simple setting if you want to cook you have everything you need inside or outside. Plenty to do within the area great options in Lewisburg (15 min) like Grams’s Eatery for breakfast, or shops on main st. home of Bucknell University or head to Bloomsburg (30 min) for Dinner at the Farmhouse or Brewery at Turkey Hill, and more shopping options on main st home of Bloomsburg University.
If you are looking for a getaway this place is perfect, and Kirk is an outstanding host, attentive to making your stay the most enjoyable!

Kirk's listing is definitely a unique and memorable stay! I've stayed in plenty of AirBnBs that are renovated and nice, but there's nothing I love more than plenty of space outdoors to hang out and relax. I loved the patio and the dock! The included kayaks (plus paddles & life jackets) were an above-and-beyond host touch! Everything was tidy, clean, and just right for a short trip. Gorgeous views were also included!
Just what we needed for a quick trip to see our kid off to college!

The place was exactly as described the only down part would be the shower it was very inconsistent with the temperature but they were very helpful and the place was perfect for some away time. The water only goes to about 3 feet deep so not what I was expecting but still fun.

We visited with our 1 month old and had the perfect weekend getaway. The home and location exceeded our expectations. We enjoyed relaxing by the fire and grilling. We visited the Street of Shops which was neat. If you’re looking for restaurants, Grams Eatery, Skeeters BBQ and the Rusty Rail were all amazing. Grams Eatery had great gluten free food! We will likely stay at Kirk’s again :)
Beautiful location and perfect accommodations. Clean, organized, and great host!

This little house is great for a couple’s getaway. It’s modestly decorated, very clean, and right next to the river. The dock is perfect for watching the sun set!
The yard has some beautiful big trees, plenty of options for seating, and a nice size fire pit. We really appreciated the kindling, and DRY firewood!
Kirk, and his wife, make sure that you have everything you need for a pleasant stay. Check-in was super easy, and communication was great!
The only thing we struggled with was the length of the bed. I’m 5’7, and my boyfriend is 6’1, so if you’re tall you should keep that in mind. - That said, we hope to visit, again, in the fall! :)

Amazing! This place is perfect for a weekend getaway for 2. They have literally everything you need for cooking (electric griddle, single burner, small toaster oven, toaster and much more.) Outside you are well supplied with comfortable chairs, fire starting supplies, kayaks, canoe, life jackets, paddles, etc. Exactly what your looking for. Comfortable inside, air conditioner works great also! TV can rotate so that you can watch it from the bedroom if you want. Would reccomend this for any couple, amazing place!
An amazingly beautiful site. Just what we needed for a couple days away from it all.
Great lil spot for a getaway for a mature loving couple

We had a great stay in this tiny house!
This location on the river was absolutely beautiful. It was a great stay for just the two of us to check out a few breweries and come back to a comfortable waterfront stay. We thoroughly enjoyed the quiet evening around the fire as the sun set.
Providing the kayaks was a great bonus as well.
Also, breakfast at Gram’s was delicious. Thanks for the recommendation.
Hope to return again for a longer stay!
Thanks for everything
We had a great weekend getaway at Kirk’s place! It was true to the descriptions. The tiny house had everything we needed for the stay. Definitely bring bug sprays to use! Highly recommend.
Peaceful & relaxing. Cute house and close enough to parks.

Our stay at the tiny house was incredible! The access to the river and kayaks were more than we could’ve asked for! The boat launch was a surprise and something we’ll keep in mind for next time. The different seating areas on the property were very inviting. We really enjoyed the fire pit and grill. The location is mostly private, however there are neighboring houses on either side the back is blocked by trees but the front of the house is wide open to the neighboring property, I’m assuming the owner. It was very quiet and we didn’t mind the highway noise at all. The house was mostly well stocked and the cleaning products were very useful to help keep the space tidy. The mattress is very comfortable, but the bed is rather small (a double). The shower temperature is very hard to control which was a little disappointing after spending so much time outside and needing a nice shower. The air conditioning kept the place very cool and when we had the chance to open all the bedroom windows it was amazing listening to the river and enjoying the breeze. We brought some yard games too and really enjoyed all the time outside and on the river. Highly recommend the tiny house by the river!

We had a great time enjoying this property. It is situated in a great spot where you can disconnect and plug into nature and the river but also enjoy the perks of being close to Lewisburg. We brought our canoe and used the kayaks at the house as well and even though the water level was lower due to dam repairs, we had a great time. The house was so clean and well stocked. Kirk was easy to communicate with and made it simple to check in. Great spot for couples or for couples and a small child or two!

The tiny house is so cute. Kirk was responsive and was very accommodating to us when we met in person. The river water level was low due to the dam being damaged, but we still managed to catch a few fish right from the property. As other reviewers mentioned, there is traffic & train noise which is very audible but that didn't take away from our "glamping" experience. Most things we needed was provided and the location is close to everything.

Kirk’s tiny home was the perfect weekend getaway for our anniversary! The views of the river are beautiful, and the home is clean and cozy. We enjoyed relaxing by the fire pit at night, grilling dinner, and paddle boarding (brought our own, although they do provide two kayaks) the river. We even had an eagle fly right in front of us while relaxing in the yard! Fourth of July fireworks along the river properties were a nice bonus. All around, it was a great stay, and I’m sure we will be back some day!

Amazing home! Close to everything. Between all the extras this house includes and the amazing river view, I was in awe the entire stay! I loved the fire pit and the view from the bedroom. Even sitting outside and looking up the stars at night gave me a great sense of peace. The hosts were great communicators. Can’t wait to stay again.
Prefect stay for husband and I with 9month old. Beautiful nature and has everything you need for your stay. Would come again.
Perfect little getaway. Description very accurate. Very clean and cozy space for 2.
This Tiny House is in a magical setting! It is clean, inviting and cozy inside, while spacious and pictoresque outside.
This was our second time here and we love it. The little extras that the hosts include and help with are great. Can’t wait till we come back again!!

This property was beautiful and a great getaway. The home has wonderful amenities and is close to shops and restaurants in nearby Lewisburg. I highly recommend this to others looking for a peaceful week or weekend.
It was like a dream! Has all the little things you may need for your stay and the sleeping area was lovely!

Such a cute house! Loved the location. Rained while we were here but the house had everything we needed. Would
Come again and loved fishing off the edge.
Kirk was super responsive and helpful. Perfect little get away!
kirk's place was a nice weekend getaway, the view was beautiful along with good amenities. it was a great experience!

Great tiny house in an incredibly beautiful location on the Susquehanna River! Very clean, well cared for. Three very nice outdoor seating areas. Despite being a tiny house, it did not feel like there was a lack of space. Outside, lots of bird activity on the river, including bald eagles who were regular features during our stay. As other reviewers have noted, you can hear the traffic at night — but that is solved easily with a pair of earplugs. Well worth it to enjoy this beautiful place!
Beautiful tiny home!! Gorgeous view of the river. Host was very responsive and helpful. We are hoping to come back in the summer.

We were looking for a relaxing getaway. We found everything we were looking for and more! Quiet and peaceful retreat, beautiful scenery, close to so many things to do, yet secluded and private. The house was stocked with everything necessary! The owners but so much thought into what might be needed or would be wanted. It was perfect! We would love to come stay again!
Adorable house. Spotless and has everything you need. Loved it.

Kirk and Danielle's tiny home by the river is indeed a beautiful retreat and get away for one or two people. It is just as it appears in the photos. The views from the windows in the bed area are incredible as many other reviewers have stated. We enjoyed sitting outside when the weather allowed as the river is beautiful and peaceful. The tiny home is situated next to the river. On the other side there is a major roadway and train track which you cross over . The road noise was audible at times but not a problem. Our visit took place in April and the river was too high & rough to use the kayaks. We may have to return for a Summer or Fall visit! This is a wonderful tiny home that feels spacious due to the way that Kirk and Danielle have designed the interior and exterior outdoor space.
Very peaceful and beautiful place! My husband and I have a wonderful, unforgettable time! Will definitely be back soon. Highly recommended it! Thanks so much!

This place is so cozy & perfect for a little getaway! It does get cold so bring extra blankets & warm pajamas. All the necessary items were there plus some extras (firewood, games). Would go back in a heart beat!!!
Cozy place with a great view! Had all necessities and great location.

Everything is as described. My boyfriend got to fish right off the property while I grilled dinner and it was a serene experience. I loved waking up and rolling up the blinds right from the bed to enjoy the view. Looking forward to going again in warmer months.
The place was amazing and beautiful. Everything for grilling and the camp fire was supplies. Definitely would visit again.

This is the perfect house for a quiet weekend away for a single traveler or couple. It’s location along the river is great and we appreciated the proximity to Lewisburg. The house is exactly as described and fit a lot of helpful amenities in such a tiny house. We would not hesitate to stay here again.

The tiny home was perfect. I loved everything the house offered inside and out. The area is beautiful. It was so peaceful and relaxing. It was just what my girlfriend and I were looking for. The views are amazing. I can’t wait to come back and stay again. I highly recommend this place for a solo or a romantic getaway. There home offers all the basic items you need for cooking. There are several grocery stores and restaurants in the area.
Super cute tiny home!
Host was always available for questions. The house is well insulated. While one night the outdoor temp was 55 degrees, inside was very comfortable with the baseboard on Low. Can’t wait to return.

What a great beautiful location. The tiny house has all your needs and perfectly situated on the River property. Kirk was spot on with a response on a couple of needs for us. Beautiful sunrise and sunset! We would definitely stay again!
Would definitely stay again, it was perfect for a weekend getaway with my girlfriend!

Beautiful location on the river! Perfect for a relaxing stay! The host communicates exceptionally well.
As other reviews have noted, you are close to the highway and train tracks, so expect to hear traffic and/or trains most of the time. Also, if you're taller, you might find the bed a little small. But if you want a beautiful location on the river, you cannot beat this place!

I booked a long weekend trip here as a gift for my fiancé to celebrate our anniversary. I definitely paid more than I had hoped for a 2 night stay however with it being october & probably a very popular time of year to visit, I feel lucky to have found this gem available! This was absolutely perfect for the two of us - the view is outstanding. We enjoyed our wine from Union Cellars (only about 15 min away!) as we sat by the fire pit overlooking the water. This was the most low key weekend and I wouldn’t have had it any other way! Kirk was extremely kind and welcoming as well. We truly enjoyed our stay & look forward to coming back again in the future. I highly recommend this spot if you want a simple, relaxing getaway.
nice service
A perfect spot for a relaxing getaway. Kirk was exceptionally communicative leading up to my stay. I was left with no questions. I'd gladly stay here again.
Super clean and super cute tiny house by the Susquehanna River. It is a small space but well decorated and organized.
This place is beyond perfect
Great tiny home with a lot of outdoor space and great riverviews. The sunrise is a mustsee!

The tiny house is even better than imagined! It looks exactly like the pictures, although feels so much larger. There is plenty of space outside to relax, have your morning coffee, watch the birds. All the necessities are provided. As someone had mentioned in a previous review, there is a Weiss market about 10 minutes on route 15 where you can pick up a few groceries/beer/wine. If you want to grill, everything is provided in the house. There is a coffee maker, toaster, toaster oven if you want to stay in for breakfast. Having the dock and the kayaks was a real treat! My husband spent time fishing before we headed out to explore in the kayaks. We spent much time watching the birds. There are plenty of scenic places to explore in the area. The campus of Bucknell University is beautiful to drive through as is the Bucknell Golf Course. We found a great Italian restaurant "Primavera" on Route 45 which is right off of Route 15, only 10 minutes or so from the house. The fire pit was great! We enjoyed a glass of wine by the fire every night. The view from the bedroom was gorgeous! We very much enjoyed the beautiful colors of the sunrise. We also enjoyed the sunset later in the day. The Tiny House is a perfect spot, we will definitely be back. Thank you Kirk!
This is an amazing place, great location and just the perfect size. Great for a few day get away!
Absolutely beautiful view of the river in the morning! Property was in perfect condition when we arrived. Owner was super responsive to anything we needed or questions we had.
I would have given this 10 stars but it only allowed 5. A perfect getaway to unplug and recharge. Will definitely be back!

This tiny house is absolutely adorable. It’s cozy, clean and quaint. It has an amazing lake view, a great patio area and all the accommodations you need. It’s perfect for one or 2 people and I highly recommend!

Great stay here. Very nice to have private dock and boat ramp. Good fishing on the river. Place was very clean and up to date. Almost everything you need provided right down to the small stuff. Some road noise from the highway but would still recommend a stay here!
Great place for a getaway! My husband and I had so much fun and it was so peaceful. Worth every penny!
Great location, great host, great fun

What a great place to be!
The house, the river, fireplace and all other small things. It’s a total package you wish for your getaway trip. Love to visit again!

The tiny house feels anything but. The yard and water access is picturesque and breathtaking from the bed. Danielle and Kirk are great hosts who made sure our trip was smooth and comfortable. So close to everything, yet feels like a getaway… we would absolutely come back for another stay.
Great stay
Great little place. Stayed there as a long weekend getaway for our anniversary and it was just what we needed.
Clean, great outdoor space, and close to the water! We enjoyed our little getaway.
The best place ever! Will be staying again

A Quaint Tiny Home.... Right on the River....
Provides what is needed for a time of simplicity. Does get noisy with everyone playing in the day. Very Clean, air conditioned, with the ability to open windows if a breeze is desired. Provides a coffee maker, toaster oven, griddle, mini fridge, microwave, outside grill, dishes. You may enjoy the outside patio, use the grill to prep a meal, have a fire in the fire ring, use the kyaks or raft to paddle around in the river, or just sit on the floating dock and enjoy watching everyone enjoy the water, the wildlife, and of course the sunsets. Pack simply, but bring some groceries with you. Coffee, creamer, breakfast foods, snacks, etc, if you dont plan on eating out the whole time. Lewisburg is about 10 minutes away and provides Weis Markets, with some neat places to visit. Some are on the the main strip called Market St. Others are slightly off Market St. Use your maps app to find attractions, shopping, and restaurants. Near Bucknell University.

The proximity to water is unbeatable! Great place to relax and have a great time. The Tiny House is cute and true to name when it comes to sleeping situation. We were 2 adults with an almost 2 year old, which may have been a stretch. It would have been perfect for a couple.
Their description is accurate in the listing and we had a great time. The place was super clean and easy to find. I miss the access to water already!

This tiny home was exactly what we needed for our 4th of July getaway.
The view is gorgeous and there are 2 kayaks and an inflatable boat with ores if you wanna spend some time on the river. There’s a private dock with chairs on the river as well which was great for taking in the view and watching fireworks from neighboring areas.
The house is flanked (not very closely) by other properties so not max privacy if all blinds are open. Only the river facing windows offer full privacy.
Kirk was very easy to reach and I think lives nearby should you need anything. He provided check in details well in advance and check in was very easy.
All in all we had a great stay and would go back/ recommend this tiny home.

So lovely! This spot was everything we needed for a quick getaway. I definitely recommend staying longer if you can! The bed was comfortable and the view was incredible. Very quiet neighbors and over all tranquil experience. Definitely looking forward to visiting again. The river water was very calm and surprisingly warm! The dock area and patio area was great for your morning coffee. Sunsets and sunrises are stunning and you can see so many stars at night. Definitely bring things to grill because this place is perfect for it and the firepit was a great treat. Can't wait to come back.
all excellent, we love this place!

My partner and I spent one night in this adorable home dreaming we could stay longer. The view from the bed was truly stunning, nearby downtown was ridiculously charming, and we got to see a river otter; so I’d say we had a wonderful time.
Niceeeee! Got way more than we expected. Great hospitality, beautiful place. Loved just being able to kick back , grill, use the fire pit, and enjoy the views. Definitely worth the drive.
Such a cute little spot. Very clean and great accommodations. Host gave great recommendations for nearby activities. Worth a visit!!

This place is great! A bed surrounded by windows overlooking a river was incredible. Sat on the dock for hours and watched an eagle fly around. Plenty of space around house to throw football and Frisbee. Highly recommend
We had an absolutely wonderful stay. Everything was perfect and we loved the location. We will definitely be staying again!
This tiny house has everything you could possibly need for a weekend trip and was so relaxing. I would definitely return!

This tiny house has just enough to keep one comfortable with peaceful views. there is some nearby highway traffic and the occasional train, but nothing disruptive. Very easy drive to anything you may need from downtown Lewisburg shops to all the national chains you're used to.
Would stay again.

The house was perfect!! My love and I loved waking up to the beautiful view of the lake. Everything was clean and the little extras were perfect like having firewood available to the small bag of coffee. We can’t wait to come back!!

Expect exactly what is described on the airbnb site, small but clean, wonderful outdoor environment and the hosts were responsive. I had one question and it was answered immediately. We really enjoyed the house.
Wonderful place! Highly recommend. Bring bug spray tho. Nature is beautiful💖💖
Thanks for a great stay! The view was stunning, and waking up to the sunset over the lake was fantastic!
Very lovely and relaxing place

Kirk’s tiny home is perfect for a quick getaway. It has everything you need, including great local recommendations. The view of the river is unbeatable. Cozy and romantic. Would definitely recommend checking it out, as well as the town of Lewisburg, PA.
We had a wonderful time! The location was amazing and the house was clean and cozy. Highly recommend!
Clean place with beautiful views of the river. A really nice place to stay

Beautiful tiny home and definitely worth the cost, waking up with a view of the river is second to none. Only thing is to be ready to see some bugs/spiders as it gets buggy at night with the river being right there.

Kirk’s place was very clean and special. If you’re looking for a place to unwind from your hectic fast city life or just if you want to spend a special time with your special person, this is a place to really take advantage of. It’s views, things to do make them ideal for any couple. Would recommend it to everyone who wants to relax and enjoy a piece of paradise in PA.

We had a wonderful stay at Kirk’s tiny home, but never felted tiny. The house is very clean, cozy and well organized. The house was spacious for us (two people) than what I thought. I love it. They did provide us two kayaks and directions to nearest hiking place and brewery. This place is wonderful to the people who like to relax, chill and sip a wine while sitting next to the River bank. I would definitely visit this place again!
Excellent stay! Lovely home and great amenities provided.
The house is very nice, clean, and has everything I expected and more. Kirk and Danielle were very nice and responsive to my questions and requests. The view is amazing!
Such a nice location, we had an absolute blast. lots to do in the area and everyone is very friendly. We will for sure be revisiting!

This tiny house was a great little getaway! It made for relaxing evenings and perfect mornings as you can watch the sunrise across the river. Kirk and Danielle were kind and quick to respond. The space itself was very clean and organized and equipped with all the amenities you need. They also left some great restaurant and hiking recommendations that were spot on.
Perfect getaway spot! The view is amazing. The house has just what you need.
Really cool area and cool space! Loved the fire pit and the view of the river.

I had a very relaxing time by the river. The house was very clean, with little treats! I went antiquing at a town nearby and found some pretty interesting things. Made a little fire pit, and just took in the scenery. Thank you!
Was pretty chilly and windy which definitely impacts how warm the house was able to get. Overall it is a beautiful view and lovely getaway for one or two people.
The home is a lovely place for a retreat along the Susquehanna River! Great view with good amenities!!
Beautiful space, views and location! Photos give a very accurate view of the home. Very clean and everything we needed for our stay! Great for a getaway with your love ❤️ we’ll be back

One word WOW; really nice, clean and peacefull place. Nice to relax, having a coffee at the porch in the morning and sitting here also in the evening. You find all you need, and Melanie and Andy help you with all requests. Christophe & Yasmine Luxembourg/Europe
The cabin felt like you were a guest in a friend's home. Very clean, and someone knows interior design. 😉 The amenities were terrific and we want to come back!

Andy and Melanie have a wonderful home with three beds and a chimney in the living room, as well as an outdoor shower. The chimney was a family favorite and the river was a wonderful sight to have in the backyard.
Thank you Andy and Melanie for hosting such a wonderful home!

Perfect get away! Very clean and accommodating. They have the little things for their guests, first aid kit, river towels, coffee, etc... I rented this Airbnb for my cousin and I as we had a guided fishing trip scheduled. I was wanting the trip to be special and memorable as my cousin and I love to fish and don't get to spend much time together. This cabin helped complete the perfect week.
The area is great, close to town but also isolated just enough to chill out on the back porch and enjoy nature. We could not have chosen a better place to stay. You get more than what you pay for which is a rarity in today's world.
We got very lucky, and I was honored to be a guest of this host.
Darrell J Shaver
Beautiful house right on the creek and close enough to restaurants without the noise!

We enjoyed our stay at the Creekside cabin! Cabin was comfortable and cozy. Loved having coffee on back porch in the morning. Even saw a bald eagle fly by. Cabin had everything we needed. Looking forward to staying again!

really nice cabin on the river .
I was intown working didn't have much time to enjoy 🙃.
Definitely recommend
Beautiful place w great amenities.
We enjoyed our stay at Melanie's cabin! The lovely view of the river was great. All the Christmas lights along 204 were a pleasant sight this time of year. The house had all the amenities we needed.

Lovely house by the water! This was a great place to stay for a couple nights to relax and regroup. Easy access to hiking trails, lovely porch to sit and watch with water and very clean and comfortable cabin to be cozy and relax! Thanks for a great stay.
Loved the cabin with the wood stove, and firewood ready to use. The kayaks were also fun to go up Penns creek.

Andy & Melanie were good hosts. Sometimes the response was a little slow. The place was just as described. Everything was clean and beds were comfy. Kitchen was nice too. It comfortable and a peaceful location.

This is our 2nd visit and just like the first it was a beautiful peaceful and calm stay. The cabin is a perfect get away when you just need a break. Having the wood stove inside and the fire pit outside was a treasured feeling of calm. This cabin has everything you need for a family or couples get away. Fully equipped kitchen, living room full of games and cozy blankets. Rooms are a nice size but have the calm cozy feeling. True treasured gem in PA.
Lovely place to stay when visiting Susquehanna University. Very clean and loved being right on the creek.

The home is quaint and situated on a beautiful piece of property. Photos are an accurate representation of the home and it was very clean and comfortable. Kitchen was well-organized and items were easy to fine. They had a nice coffee area with all needed amenities. Bathroom is spacious- only downside is the strong smell of sulphur, which owners note in their description and is due to water source. Wifi is speedy. They have a lovely covered deck with comfortable furniture. I really enjoyed sitting out in the morning and watching the creek and wildlife.
We had a great time! The place was super clean and in a great location. We are already talking about going back soon.

The cabin was ideally located as we were visiting the local university, but in a very peaceful setting right on Penn’s creek. Everything that we needed was provided and easy to find. We had a small issue with the water, but Melanie responded extremely fast and was able to help us sort out the problem within the hour. Great host and a great stay!

It was a steal for the price they charge. Porch and back yard was fantastic wood supplied for fire and fishing poles and kayaks. Crazy. Inside was nicely finished and perfect. Too much good to say about this place. Thank you for shari g it with us

Perfect place to stay for our visit to Knoebels (about 1/2 hr) and Dutch Wonderland (longer but doable!). The cabin is super cute and very clean! Sitting outside in the backyard along the creek was so peaceful and relaxing. When it was raining, the covered porch was just as nice. Hosts are very friendly, even checked on us when severe weather and tornado watches came through. I wish I would have planned a longer trip! We will definitely stay here again if we head back out that way!

From start to finish it was truly a great experience. This was a quiet getaway for my son and I, only a few hour drive from our home. We felt like we were right at home nestled in this adorable and clean cabin. The hosts made everything so accessible and easy, they had everything you will need to function and enjoy. We mostly stayed on the property, taking full advantage of the beautiful and serene surroundings. My son was in the creek in the easily accessible kayaks every day. It was very close to everything you’d need(shops, restaurants etc) yet felt like you were tucked away in the middle of nowhere which gave the best of both worlds. Would highly recommend and would love to return and stay longer next time!!
No detail was overlooked! We were comfortable, safe, and enjoyed our stay very much.

What a fantastic place to stay! We had a great time with our 3 teenage sons; swimming and kayaking in the river, Knoebels for 3 days and a huge Community Thrift Store. This home was extremely clean, beautifully decorated, and fully stocked with everything you could possibly need (which were so well organized and labeled)…all bedding, bath and bathing towels, 4 fishing rods and kayaks!! We want to go back. Loved every minute!

We really enjoyed our time at Andy and Melanie’s place. We relaxed on the back porch and loved listening to the creek and watching the various wildlife. We saw cranes, ducks geese, deer. We were entertained by watching a mother duck coax her ducklings back down steam after their swim upstream. We were able to use the fire pit when it wasn’t storming or too hot. When it was too hot or humid we enjoyed the cozy air conditioned cabin. It seems like you are in a rural area at the cabin but it is just a few miles from Selingsgrove.
This place was great supper clean has everything u would need and even more the owners are supper sweet an helpful as well

We really enjoyed our weekend at the cabin. The river and birds created a very peaceful and relaxing scene. The house had plenty of games to play and fishing poles to use. Thank you for sharing your home with us.

Absolutely better than expected.
You feel like you are in a remote location but all amenities are within 10 minutes.
Super clean and comfortable.
Thanks for a great weekend getaway!

What a great getaway! Beautiful surroundings, great fishing spot right out back, peaceful, and clean. We stayed a long weekend to go to Knoebel's and this location was perfect for a quiet getaway with the family yet close to town. Highly recommend!
Great location on the creek. Fishing was good and relaxing. Great quiet spot. A lot of restaurants and grocery stores nearby.

Great amenities. Little extras like microwave popcorn, oatmeal packets, spices and coffee. Cabinets each well marked as to contents.
Very welcoming hosts, stayed in readily available communication, although we.didn't need to make contact.
Cabin was tricky to find, we didn't see numbers on tree or house. Took a couple of passes to find it. I would recommend placing a rural mailbox or roadside post with 1806 on it in large reflective numbers at the entry driveway.

Our family had the best time at the cozy cabin! We fished all day and caught countless small mouth bass. We enjoyed the kayaks, the fire ring and the gorgeous scenery. We really could not have asked for a better little getaway. The home was beautifully decorated and had everything we needed. Wonderful hosts!

Great little place with access to creek only feet away. Had a great time watching my teenage son and his friends reel in one smallmouth bass after another. Owners very responsive to any needs or questions.

A wonderful home away from home. Being right on the water was a dream for us. The cottage is a perfect place for quality family time. My family spent an entire day swimming, kayaking and fishing in the river and having a bonfire. The cottage is equipped with every need possible. Perfect place to rest and reset. Enjoying the daily wildlife of deer, geese, birds, chipmunks and jumping fish made for a great morning coffee entertainment.
The kitchen was fully equipped to cook meals. The owners provide fantastic games for the family to play. Lots of space to relax and unwind.
The local store Heimbach's is a great, I suggest ordering cupcakes. Delicious! A large chain grocery store is about 3 miles away.
For a cute afternoon activity we played putt putt near by at Susquehanna Sports Complex.
The cottage is located nicely near Knobels and Hershey Park. Off the beaten tourist path.
We truly enjoyed our time and plan to back.

Staying here was above and beyond my expectations! It was very affordable, comfortable & clean. Plus these guys really thought of everything... Everything was clearly labeled and easy to find. The kitchen was stocked with everything you could literally need. Having the kayaks and grill was nice. We even used the little stereo at one point and the board games. It was a nice place to stay and I definitely reccomend it for anyone. We were able to go to knobles two of the days and the rest of our time was fishing, cooking and relaxing!
This was a wonderful weekend getaway for my husband and I! Loved sitting by the water and relaxing.

Andy and Melanie have gone above and beyond setting up their cabin for travelers. The home is nicely set up and has everything one could want for a weekend, or longer, get away. The place was very clean and comfortable. The home was in a perfect location next to the river and provided a quick drive into town if needed. Andy and Melanie were quick to respond with any questions. This place is truly a bargain and we would definitely stay here again.
Charming cabin with a great location. It was so peaceful and relaxing. The communication and amenities were great. Perfect.
Nice and easy stay, as advertised
Beautiful home on the river. Very peaceful, enjoyed our time away. Really nice home.

Really relaxing cozy cabin, great location, plenty of seating areas, the bed was very comfortable. Everything was marked clearly and well thought out for anything we would need. Good communication with the hosts, overall a nice getaway.

This was the perfect place for a relaxing weekend getaway for three busy mamas. It was very clean and had everything we needed. We spent most of our time on the deck watching the wildlife. We left feeling so refreshed. Can’t wait to book it again!

This is a lovely little cabin that had everything that we needed. The backyard area is right on the river and it’s very serene. We didn’t get around to using the fire pit but I think it would be super cozy! There’s a good bit of space inside and it was nice to have a choice of places to hang out inside the cabin. I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again.

We just loved our stay at this cute cabin. A lot of thought went into the decor and amenities provided. Everything was labeled so you could find what you were looking for and put it back in the right place. The basket of goodies in the kitchen and the Keurig with the coffee was wonderful. We enjoyed sitting on the back porch watching the creek and the wildlife. We even saw an eagle one morning!
Beautiful location for our girls trip! Even nicer than the pictures show! Great central location for running into town and visiting local attractions!

My friends and I had a wonderful stay at Andy and Melanie's cabin. It was clean, easy to check-in, and included thoughtful touches that made our stay memorable. The backyard is peaceful and perfect for enjoying time outside. I would highly recommend staying here!
Great cozy cabin - creek is awesome! Found lots to do within an hour of the location - fossil hunting, state parks, animal experiences, etc. Cabin was very well-stocked and had everything we needed.
We had a comfortable stay! Thank you!
I would have gave 10 stars out of 5. Everything was great: The location, the view, the house, the communication with Andy and Melanie. We had a beautiful and relaxing weekend. Highly recommended.
This is an amazing spot to come and relax! Put the phones down and all other electronics and just sit in the water or kayak up and down the creek.

Everything about this place is amazing!!! The home is perfect for a couple, or small family. The location is phenomenal, and although you’re in the middle of it all (restaurants, stores, etc.) you also feel very secluded as well. We cannot wait to be back! Thank you Melanie and Andy!

The cabin was perfect for our stay. The setting along the creek was beautiful and relaxing. We had everything we needed for our stay. The neighbors were friendly and helpful, the fishing was good and we enjoyed the local restaurants.
Great home in a very pretty spot. Relaxing. The host has done agreat job of making you feel at home, with the things you would have in your own home.
We had everything we needed and more! It’s close to stores and full of charm. My husband and I had a very relaxing stay.

Lovely spot! We especially loved being outside: great deck and fire pit. Right on the river, which was so peaceful. My brother-in-law stopped by for the fishing and caught and released about a dozen fish in an hour! We will definitely be back!
Great place to stay. Very clean. Lots of comfortable seating inside and great places to sit on the porch or fire pit.

Great house. It had everything we needed for a very relaxing weekend. Andy and Melanie even provided firewood for the firepit. We were able to unplug and appreciate the outdoors. We would to stay here again.
Lovely house in a very convenient location. Beautiful view of the creek and very comfortable accommodations.

We really enjoyed our long weekend stay at Andy and Melanie's place. House was clean, stylish, comfortable, and in a nice location on the water. It was lovely and would be happy to stay in the future!

Perfect location right by the river. The decorations made it feel like home and the house was better than the description. Couldn’t have been a better spot for dogs.

Looks just like the pictures and has everything you would need. Karen was very helpful and responsive. My dog had lots of fun playing in the river and fenced in area. Hoping to come back in the summer.

Thanks for sharing your quant farm house cottage on the river. So relaxing and we felt right at home upon entering the property and house. Everything was perfect and well stocked. Karen was so nice and easy to communicate with. We plan on returning for future travels.
