We appreciated the tour at check in to gain the nuances of the property. We enjoyed the many wineries and breweries surrounding the area. This was a beautiful home and would love to come back during the cooler months.

We loved our stay! The hosts were very friendly and accommodating. The house was very clean, decorated beautifully with great amenities!
It was a very relaxing stay! Beautiful views. Indoor and outdoor games, kayaks, fishing and more. Shopping nearby if you forgot to pack anything, and lots to do in the area.
We definitely recommend this AirBnb and we hope to stay here again in the future!
We had a fantastic couple days at this house. Very well appointed and clean. Very relaxing and beautiful views. David and Matthew were great host !!

We have only good things to say about our stay at Earl's Landing. Our check in experience with Matthew was welcoming and informative. The listing description and photos do not do this place justice! This is a beautiful cabin with thoughtful and stylish upgrades throughout. It was the perfect place to travel as a grown family - my parents were able to lounge on the deck, in the screen porch or by the campfire, while my sibling and I and our spouses played lawn games, kayaked, or (attempted to) fish from the dock. It's clearly also welcoming to families with younger kids with bunk beds and Pac-Man in the game room, board games & lawn games provided, and so much room to run around. The house is secluded and serene with lots of local wildlife enjoying the acreage, that you forget that you're only about 5 minutes from town and about 10 minutes from several restaurants and grocery stores. This place is a gem and we could not recommend it more highly!
Fantastic home. Beautiful property. Plenty of room for our big family. Looking forward to renting house again!!

This place is really beautiful. It is so well decorated and clean. Unfortunately, it stormed for our entire stay so we were unable to take advantage of the outdoor amenities, but we did play a few of the board games. It was a nice stay.

Lovely getaway on the river! Gorgeously updated cabin with everything you could need to cook up a feast, enjoy slow mornings looking out at the wildlife, and evenings relaxing on the back deck. Our kids loved the tree swing and had plenty of space to run around outside. The screened porch is a gem— I could literally sit out there all day and read and listen to the sounds of the woods evolve over the day. Matt is super welcoming, communicated about everything ahead of them, and Matt & David have thought of everything you could need for a relaxing weekend exploring the region (or just enjoying this sweet spot!).

This Airbnb was truly one of the best places we have ever stayed. It was truly a home away from home and no detail was forgotten. The beds were comfortable, the showers were hot with great water pressure, wood for fireplaces fully stocked, kitchen utensils enough to prepare a Thanksgiving dinner. The home was incredibly clean and welcoming, right down to the towels for our dog’s feet. It was a bit too cool to take advantage of all of the outdoor amenities, but all of the family games were enjoyed. I highly recommend this home to anyone and hope to return here again sometime.

David has a beautiful home that was perfect for me, my husband, and 3-year-old son to meet up with my parents from Ohio for an early Thanksgiving meal. The home is absolutely beautiful with an abundance of sunshine coming in the windows. The weather was great for us and we were able to sit out on the deck in the sunshine during the day. There are working fireplaces and a fire pit, which we used continually while we were there. The kitchen is spacious and has all the cooking materials that you need to make a full Thanksgiving meal. We especially appreciated the nice touches of wine, cheese, crackers, and the S'mores kit upon arrival. The house has everything you need and it is spacious enough to "get away" for some quiet time from others if you need to. We only stayed on the property as we were enjoying our company, but we also went on walks around the property as it is so quiet and spacious. We will definitely be back for another visit with family. The views are beautiful and the entire stay was relaxing. Thank you to the hosts!

We had an amazing weekend! The house was great and provided the perfect venue for our stay. The views of the river were great and the fire pit outside was the ideal way to spend the fall evenings. Matt and David made the whole process easy and there wasn’t one thing that we needed that they hadn’t already thought of. Great place and great hosts!

If you are looking for a beautiful and comfortable stay on the Susquehanna, look no further than David’s stay! From the blend of mid-century and classic waterfront furnishing, to the comfortable bedrooms and stunning screened-in porch, you will want for nothing during your visit. David was quick to communicate and incredibly accommodating, even when we were much later than anticipated in our arrival. There were even fresh baked cookies when we got there! We will definitely be returning in the future.

Everything was great and as described. The house was charmingly decorated. David was a great host, and we enjoyed the cookies, cheese, and wine after a long drive. The rooms were comfortable and cool. The deck and grill was functional and we grilled and ate dinner every night at the deck table. We spent all three nights around the firepit roasting marshmallows and making S'mores. We took the kayaks out for a spin and got some good rest, relaxation and quiet time.
We would stay here again.

This was the best Airbnb I ever stayed. Kitchen was very well stocked with utensils, pans, spices, full pantry and a variety of hot chocolate. Every single detail was placed with thoughtfulness, even for the dogs.
Communication was on point. Always got an answer within 10 minutes.
Very clean and well maintained!
It’s quiet and very private.
Would totally recommend. Can’t wait to be back next year.

The setting, the river, the beautiful grounds, and well appointed home is a wonderful place to enjoy nature and unwind. All of the beautiful touches, home made cookies, throws in every room in case there is chill, the screened-in porch, the deck overlooking the river are amazing!

David and Matthew were fantastic hosts, the place is ready for you to just show up (not much needed, they supplied it all) and have a great time. They really anticipated our needs and the place is as good as it looks in the photos. It is immaculate and the screened in porch was my favorite spot in the evenings to relax! Great place for outdoor families with lots of activities at the house and nearby. We will certainly be back!

We had an amazing time - great location and house has all amenities. David and Matthew were extremely helpful. The house has stunning views of the river and so much outdoor space for the perfect relaxation. We truly enjoyed our stay and will definitely be back.
This home is by far the best rental we have had. The decor, location, amenities and communication with the owners is amazing! Highly recommend!
Beautiful home! Tastefully decorated and very homey. The view is amazing. I would stay here again for sure!
A great spot to get away and relax. Tons of spaces to be social or simply escape with a book or an iPad. And there’s arcade Pac-Man.

We had a great time. Very nice comfortable house. A perfect place for young children (2 and 5 years old) - just step out the door and there's a full day of adventures. And if you want, many nearby outdoor places to visit.
Lots of nice touches, like Smore kit and cookies. Great kitchen - we bought groceries at a local store and cooked all meals in the house. Very quiet and private. We would definitely come back.

A wonderful experience - great location and house has all amenities. David and Matthew were very helpful and reachable at all times. The house has stunning views of the river and lot of outdoor space. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and will definitely be back.
We had an amazing stay! Very clean, well decorated, super comfortable, great amenities and special touches, and beautiful views of nature and the river. Hosts are fantastic. Highly recommend!

Great house, very confortable and well decorated.
Beautiful and relaxing views.
We had a great and relaxing time even with the cold thanks to the light, the views, the fireplace and board games.
Amazing place, bigger than it looks and incredible views/ location. Hopefully we’ll be back soon!

This place was great and amazing views . Me and my family had a great time . David was very helpful and responded to all my questions and was very helpful on check in and out . And helpful Throughout our stay. I highly recommend this place .

My boyfriend, my cousin, her husband, and I had an amazing adult getaway weekend in November 2020. The house is beautifully decorated and the views of the water are breathtaking. Kayaking is a must !! They have kayaks and life vests for you to use. It was the highlight of our weekend. Other highlights- s’mores by the fire pit, dinner in the screened in porch where you’ll see deer and birds, and morning coffee/breakfast on the deck. There are so many places to sit and take the views in. They also provide a lot of games and blankets! We couldn’t have asked for a better weekend and we highly recommend to anyone. Local Mexican spot - el Torito was fantastic as well. Only thing to keep in mind, was the wifi wasn’t able to have more than one person, so using our personal hotspots was a must.

My family had a wonderful time staying at the cottage! The location is beautiful and secluded- perfect for social distancing! We loved the indoor fireplace, sunroom and view of the river. We greatly enjoyed the daily deer feedings from the window. There is SO much property to explore during your stay. The cottage was incredibly clean and had so many special design touches. We truly felt like we had our own little oasis! We highly recommend and looking forward to coming back in the summer! 5 stars!!

This riverside cottage is a hidden gem! The interior is beautifully decorated and thoughtfully appointed with coziness and comfort in mind--there's a tea/coffee/cocoa corner complete with small deluxe touches that we enjoyed all weekend! The master suite is gorgeous, and the screened-in porch is an especially lovely part of the house--good for watching deer and wildlife. The deck offers a breathtaking view of the river. We enjoyed kayaking and the fire pit--the outdoor areas are just as wonderful as the indoor space, with lots of room to explore and walk. My one tip would be to bring ear plugs for sleeping at night, as it is truly an old-fashioned bungalow with somewhat thin walls, so if you're a light sleeper and people are walking around in the night, it might wake you. There is a train that runs infrequently behind the house (we heard two train whistles in our four-day stay), so earplugs would also help with that. All in all, it is a spectacular property, truly magical, and the owners were very responsive and helpful. We hope to be back again regularly!!

This place is a hidden jewel. The surroundings were serene , the home felt like a 5 star resort. For those who like to cook, the kitchen is a dream. The "white glove" test passed with flying colors, the housekeeping was immaculate. We cant wait to return .
We had a wonderful time. The lake house is beautiful and very clean. Had everything we wanted in a relaxing vacation. Wish we could have stayed there longer.

We had a wonderful stay at David’s place. With two other couples we had plenty of room to hang out, cook and dine together. The outdoor space is amazing with a variety of areas on the deck, by the river and around the fire pit. We also enjoyed being able to use the kayaks. The only small issue we had was with the water pressure, which isn’t great, but we staggered showers and worked it out.

David and Matthew are such wonderful people. They are on top of everything and made sure we had everything we needed and more. The grounds are amazing and their house has such a wonderful cozy feeling. Perfect for any time of the year. We had access to everything on the property including kayaks, fire pit, the dock, the water, and so much more. They have awesome games you can play and truly thought of everything. I came with my wife, brother and his girlfriend and we had the most amazing time. It was extremely relaxing and definitely what we needed. The property is super clean and we all felt extremely safe during this strenuous period of time we are all in. We even had a chance to see the deer feeding. Truly a wonderful experience and even more wonderful people. We will be back.

David’s lake cottage is the perfect stay for a family or a an adult getaway. The place was super stylish and immaculate. Lots of space inside and out to spread out and relax. Great deck and lounge area facing the lake for you to read or eat with a view of the water. Great amenities on site and super close to a boat rental where you can rent jet skis, pontoon boats for water skiing and tubing. We couldn’t be happier with this trip. We will definitely be staying here again!

David's home is a perfect getaway location! It is clean, beautifully decorated, and fully equipped. The host is quick to respond to questions or needs as they arise and was very accommodating to our requests. There are so many great spots inside and outside to gather and relax with friends or family. I highly recommend his home to anyone and hope we have a chance to use it again in the future!
We had a wonderful getaway here! Super remote and a great option for anyone looking to get some R&R!

This house is everything that you can ever dream of. This is a house that has been in the family for generations and it was nice seeing the pictures of that in the kitchen. I thoroughly enjoyed sitting out on the screened in porch in the morning watching all of the wildlife eat from the feeder. There is a lot of wildlife from the surrounding acres and the wetlands directly adjacent to the house. Kayaks are provided which we absolutely loved and helped us explore the river during the beautiful weather. There are little spots all over the property all facing the beautiful view of the water for varying activities - sitting on the Adirondack chairs, around the firepit, loungers for sun, dining/lounging outdoors or playing games. The house is beautifully decorated and very clean and stocked with necessities. They were so accommodating to pets and provided blankets to put over the furniture and towels to wipe muddy paws. There is a huge supermarket that is a 7 minute drive from the house. Thank you again to David and Matthew for hosting us and our four legged family at this beautiful house. We will definitely be returning to make more memories

This is a really lovely house right on the water and a large bit of land - the perfect socially distanced getaway from Pittsburgh this summer. We brought paddle boards and enjoyed using the kayaks provided. The property has lots of lovely places to sit and look out on the water, including a screened-in porch and a fabulous big deck. Lots of space for frisbee, croquet, etc, and you can watch the deer come and eat from the feeder in the evening. On rainy days the kids were plenty entertained with games, movies, and there is even a Pac-Man machine. We really enjoyed our stay!

Beautiful rental in Northumberland. Lovely space right on the river with room for yard and water activities of all types. Nature abounds with deer, water fowl, groundhogs, and turtles around throughout our stay. The indoor space was thoughtful and well stocked. Outstanding hosts. Would certainly stay here again.

This is one of those places that you want to keep a secret but it absolutely deserves 5 stars all around! Quite possibly the best airbnb experience I've had! David and Matt are fantastic hosts. They are quick to communicate, thoughtful and extremely helpful.
The house and property are STUNNING. There's plenty of land and privacy. Deer visit the feeder frequently! The spacious deck and firepit area are perfect places to unwind with friends and family. Having access to a few kayaks was absolutely a bonus as well! The interior is very clean and decorated stylishly with care.
The kitchen is well stocked. It was great to prep meals inside as well as outside on the very cool double grill! There are thoughtful touches around the house including plenty of blankets and games (which is great to stay cozy if there's rain outside)!
We loved everything about this very special place. We hope to return very very soon! <3

The riverfront home is decorated impeccably with wonderful homey touches and comfortable furniture, pillows and blankets. Kitchen was stocked to satisfy our every need. The new enclosed porch and expansive deck offered plentiful seating. The views were wonderful. We had a wonderful time!
David and Matt were great hosts and the house was beautiful! The best part was that there were so many areas of outdoor space, and David and Matt we’re so accommodating. We’ll definitely be back!

The whole experience was great, starting from our fist contact with David, he was very quick with all responses and very helpful. The whole area around the house is beautiful, clean and quiet. House also very clean updated, all furniture is new and pretty, everything is thought through and feels like home. They have everything in the kitchen. Lots of garden games, koyaks, fore place outside. We would put 10 starts if we could! 100% recommend! And we definitely go there again very soon.

The house was a peaceful oasis, a much-needed respite from the current chaotic world. It was even more picturesque than we were expecting, and there were an endless number of thoughtful touches -- gourmet goodies including hot chocolate and pancake mix, kayaks and PFDs we could borrow (including for children!), board games, citronella candles, flashlights in every room, a s'mores kit and tons of firewood, bug spray... My favorite space was the covered porch, where we watched deer and ducks making Earl's Landing their own. Thank you so much for your hospitality, and we look forward to visiting again!

If you are looking for a getaway, look no further!
David’s home is thoughtfully appointed, stylish, comfortable and fun. Every detail is on point and you won’t want for anything. Also, the communication was outstanding throughout the entire time. David is a lovely guy.
Can’t wait to come back!!!

What a beautiful house! Everything in this house has been thoughtfully designed and prepared. We were very impressed. From the decor to the kitchen to the cookies, everything was great. It was a perfect fit for our family. We came in the fall so the fireplaces were super cozy. Can’t wait to come back in summertime to enjoy more of the outdoor fun.

We LOVED the decor at David's home. Very stylish and clean! the space was unique and just the right size for our family. We had a great time running the dirtbikes and four wheelers at a nearby outdoor trail riding park, and the wines at Whispering Oaks were fabulous! Easy check-in, and some unexpected treats -- the cookies were awesome! We would definitely consider staying here again.

The house was beautiful and spotless, and the setting and views were splendid. Our family had a wonderful time enjoying all the outdoor games, swimming, or simply resting surrounded by beautiful nature scenes. The house is set in a large and private water front property surrounded by protected land. The hosts were very attentive and left nice touches for us to feel welcomed, such as wine in the wine cooler and homemade muffins on the counter. Matt and David met us at the house upon arrival to give us a tour of the house and property. The following day they offered to give us a boat ride, which my family truly enjoyed. Although the property does not offer Wifi, we were able to use our cellphones as hotspots for our laptops without a problem. We like the fact that we had privacy and yet we were only minutes away from main stores and restaurants. We will definitely come back and recommend the house to our family and friends.
Miller & Belén Montealegre

This house was amazing; it was very clean, the beds were extremely comfortable, cool bathrooms and decorated so nicely. The outdoor area was great which included a fire pit, fabulous outdoor seating area, tons of outdoor games and a relaxing area to sit by the river! I would highly recommend this house for a family gathering. The host went out of their way with their hospitality and had very quick responses.

We were greeted by the host when we arrived and he showed us around the property and house which were beautiful. The house was sparkling clean and the decor was amazing. The view of the river was awesome and my kids had a blast jumping off of the dock into the water. Everything was there for us, plenty of firewood and even the s’mores! The host was very accommodating and could not be more helpful. There is a lot to do in the area and you can rent a boat to waterski at Shikellamy State Park which is about a mile away. I highly recommend staying here and I have already told friends about the great time we had!
